title: 2016 Season in review wont show my personal stats

embed.description: Take a look at a data-filled journey through a year of League.

body: It wont show me my own stats, it says login to view stats even when i'm already logged in.

replies.body:
If anyone currently having this problem, can you confirm here what happens for me when you visit specifically [this page](https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review) - and then click the Login to Review button?

**UPDATE [14/12/2016 2:43PM AEDT]: **
There are a couple of things you can do if you're not able to load the page. I'll list them in a recommended order below:

* Make sure you're using the OCE version of the page [here](https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review)
* Try relogging into the webpage (logout at the top right of your page) and try again.
* Try loading the results page directly [here](https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review/personal-stats)

If none of the above work for you - there is a known issue with some accounts not being able to load that page correctly. We're currently working on fixing this issue for those players, but there's currently no specific ETA for the fix.
Refreshes the page, the url attempts to add the /personal-stats but it instantly goes back to the normal page.
Can you try logging out (with the bar at the top, on the right) and then logging in again - and seeing if that resolves the issue?
Nope have tried it multiple times.

Can you try what SmashBro did here, and try going to this URL directly? 

https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review/personal-stats
Still not working.

From some further investigation, It looks like we're having some issues with particular accounts within Oceania that prevents them from loading the page.

If you've tried all the above things, then it's likely that you're account is one of the impacted ones. The team who is responsible for the site is currently looking into a fix, but there's no ETA as of yet.
As long as I get to see my stats before you take down that part of the site, then I'm happy.
I have the exact same problem I really wanna see my stats
same issue
It just redirects me back to the season in review homepage

From some further investigation, It looks like we're having some issues with particular accounts within Oceania that prevents them from loading the page.

It looks like this particular issue is only happening with a small number of players, but if you've tried all the above things, then it seems your account is one of these. The team responsible for the year in review site is currently working on a fix, but there's no ETA as of yet, unfortunately.

Is there a fix yet? still waiting.

ive tried everything and nothing is working.
i logged onto my smurf account and it worked fine.
As soon as i log into my main nothing happens. please help
Same mine is still not working.
Hi, has it been fixed yet? I still can't see mine and I don't know if i'll be able to see it before the final date
19 days later and I was able to check my stats last night, but now today I'm trying to get a friend to look at theirs, and neither of us are able to do it?
Yeah I still can't login to check mine either, same problems as other people have said Y_Y
I have the same problem, I'm on EUW though.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
It says page not found
I have tried all methods suggested in this thread and still unable to work, all it does is refresh the page even though it attempts to use the personal stats page

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eoQivRzV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-14T03:08:54.239+0000)
>
> If anyone currently having this problem, can you confirm here what happens for me when you visit specifically [this page](https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review) - and then click the Login to Review button?
> 
> **UPDATE [14/12/2016 2:43PM AEDT]: **
> There are a couple of things you can do if you're not able to load the page. I'll list them in a recommended order below:
> 
> * Make sure you're using the OCE version of the page [here](https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review)
> * Try relogging into the webpage (logout at the top right of your page) and try again.
> * Try loading the results page directly [here](https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review/personal-stats)
> 
> If none of the above work for you - there is a known issue with some accounts not being able to load that page correctly. We're currently working on fixing this issue for those players, but there's currently no specific ETA for the fix.

Is there any news on this? I have tried Chrome, Edge, incognito tabs, logging in and out, etc. Getting the same loop where it will briefly display the correct page in the omnibox before returning to the login page. I am not a converted account.
Also, when will this page be taken down? I feel anxious waiting for a fix.

I have a feeling that it doesn't work on any accounts that weren't originally created on OCE. My main account was an NA account in season 2-3 but I transferred when the OCE server came out. My other friends that had transferred couldn't access their personal stats for season in review either. However, my stats loaded on one of my new accounts that was created on OCE. Hopefully a rioter will see this post to hopefully develop a fix specifically for any accounts that had transferred from different regions. The problem is that the https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review/personal-stats page automatically redirects you back to the https://review2016.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/year-in-review page.
Try Opening it in an Incognito or Private Window, it worked for me

Tried all of the above strats on Chrome, Edge and Explorer and none worked. Hmm. I however did notice that chrome blocked some scripts from running, however, when i enabled those scripts it changed nothing.

Edit: Even tried incognito mode etc
I've tried all suggestions, still doesn't work, I hope you guys will fix it, will be truly special if I could see my Garen stats for 2016.

Yup, same for me, FeelsBadMan.

Hopefully gets resolved before it gets taken off the site...

I couldn't see the personal stats either despite me logging out and back in.

Could it be because our accounts wasn't originally  on OCE server but from NA/other servers before it got transferred to OCE?

My Account was made on, and for OCE tho.
It could be the case for some, but not all.
I don't know how relevant it may be but this worked for me. I simply used internet explorer instead of Chrome to view the links and it worked whereas it kept doing the loop back to login on Chrome.
That worked for me! Thank you so much!
Yeah not working for me at all. Tried relogging on the page, loading the direct results. Can you update us when It works?
Can u still do this?
Unfortunately it's been retired for this season, but keep a lookout for the 2017 Year In Review closer to the end of the season!
Grr{{champion:106}}

Can we please get this fixed, most of my friends have been talking about it and all, and they ask me what mine are, and i tell them i havent got mine since its not working, i've tried on there laptops, computers, phones nearly everything. Please get it fixed so i can find out, before you guys forget about it and start working on other things.

> Please get it fixed so i can find out, before you guys forget about it and start working on other things.



Im afraid it seem to be too late
I checked recently and it actually worked for me, it was like a few days ago, i suggest trying again at different times of days and hopefully become lucky{{summoner:4}}

I dream of one day being able to see my Elise stats for ranked last season... RIP all I get is an endless login loop.

Login using OCE version - check
Login using incognito mode - check
Login using multiple browsers -check
Login using suggested links to stats pages - check
Relogging account on website - check

The only thing I can't check are my 2016 League of Legends stats. :(
Im still experiencing the same problem. :(

It isn't working for me either Q Q I'm on NA server
I've tried everything...
It works for four of my other friends, but not me rip
same for me. transfered account some days earlier

I seem to be having the same problem as well, tried all the possible fixes but unfortunately they didn't work > w < Take your time to fix it Riot! I hope you don't feel pressured! I'm sure it's very frustrating for you :c Just thought I'd mention I'm one of those accounts that need a fix in case you need to know o;
It wont show my stats and ives tried everything mentioned

Same here, tried Chrome and explorer (still feel sick), tried all the other methods - I thought it was because i switched from EUNE to EUW, but my friends, who switched with me, are able to see that page (2 out of 3).
Have this issue as well :/ I hope this is fixed before the feature is removed, Riot fixes don't work, using another browser doesn't work
I have the same issue :( Any word of a fix yet? what the Riot dude posted doesn't work for me
same issue here
same issue here, tried everything :((( really hope this gets fixed, would love to see my stats

hey, can you guys fix mine? i really want to know 
thanks :)
